data.message: Facebook, Instagram and the newsfeed is like getting an old newspaper crap showing up from days ago. I could care less that somebody decided to comment on the photo that says," nice photo".

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Terry.  We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Juliann

Like FB listens to people. You would have never changed the feed in the first place if that was the case. Have a newsfeed that does not have crap from a week ago show up first just because someone comments on it. Everything should be from the date and time it was posted. Not because some stupid computer thinks I want to see it. Me and my clients all have moved our advertising dollars away from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn for this reason. People just keep an account to store images and wish people happy birthday. They are all a complete waste of advertising dollars. Google is paying off big for us.
